problems.title: 3D Array Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of all elements in a 3D array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: x y z (dimensions)
Next x*y lines: z space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print the sum of all elements

problems.title: 3D Array Maximum
problems.description: Find the maximum element in a 3D array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: x y z (dimensions)
Next x*y lines: z space-separated integers each
